title: Metal Baseball Bat
desc:
Post 400
-Choose a player. They are knocked out due to blunt force trauma. Their turn is skipped until a <:white:1107514189574045726> or <:red:1106234051129507932> card is played.
-If a <:white:1107514189574045726> card is played before a <:red:1106234051129507932> card is, target player wakes up with no drawback.
-If a <:red:1106234051129507932> card is played before a <:white:1107514189574045726> card, target player must draw 3 cards
